platform_overview.question: What is the AI Agent Platform?
platform_overview.response: The AI Agent Platform is a comprehensive solution for building, managing, and orchestrating intelligent AI agents. It integrates with Google AI Studio, Google Workspace apps, Gemini API, and GitHub to enable business process automation.

getting_started.question: How do I get started with the platform?
getting_started.response: To get started: 1) Sign up for an account, 2) Connect your Google AI Studio and workspace, 3) Choose from our pre-built agent templates or create a custom agent, 4) Configure your agent's settings and prompts, 5) Deploy and test your agent.

integrations.question: What integrations are supported?
integrations.response: We support integrations with Google AI Studio, all Google Workspace apps (Gmail, Drive, Docs, Sheets, etc.), Gemini API, GitHub, and more. Our platform is designed to be extensible for additional integrations.

pricing.question: What are your pricing plans?
pricing.response: We offer flexible pricing based on usage and features. Please visit our pricing page or contact our sales team for detailed information about plans that fit your needs.

technical_support.question: How do I get technical support?
technical_support.response: You can reach our technical support team through our help center, live chat, or by submitting a support ticket. Our team is available 24/7 to assist with any technical issues.

agent_customization.question: Can I customize my AI agents?
agent_customization.response: Yes! Our platform allows full customization of agent behavior, prompts, integrations, and workflows. You can modify existing templates or build completely custom agents from scratch.
